Special: Daemonbane, Power Field, Unwieldy

Note: Two-Handed unless wielder has Strength Bonus of 5+.. Acts as a Null Rod, and grants wielder the Deny the Witch Talent whilst wielded. Null Rod: psykers within 2d10 metres suffer -30 to manifest Psychic Powers. When on person provides +30 to resist any psychic powers that directly affect them
